lib/hope/components/typemap.h

00008 
00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include "hope/typelist/type_list.h"
00012 
00013 #include <type_traits>
00014 
00015 namespace hope {
00016 
00017     template <typename K, typename V>
00018     struct type_pair final {
00019         using Key = K;
00020         using Value = V;
00021     };
00022 
00023     template <typename... Types>
00024     class type_map final {
00025         constexpr static type_list<Types...> m_types{ };
00026     public:
00027 
00028         template <typename Key>
00029         static constexpr auto get() noexcept {
00030             constexpr auto index = index_of<Key>();
00031             static_assert(index < size(m_types));
00032             using pair = NthType<index, Types...>;
00033             return type_holder<typename pair::Value>();
00034         }
00035 
00036     private:
00037 
00038         template <typename Key>
00039         constexpr static std::size_t index_of() {
00040             return find_if(m_types, [](auto pair) {
00041                 using pair_t = typename decltype(pair)::Type;
00042                 return std::is_same_v<Key, typename pair_t::Key>;
00043                 });
00044         }
00045 
00046         template <typename T>
00047         struct type_checker final : std::false_type {};
00048 
00049         template <typename Key, typename Value>
00050         struct type_checker<type_pair<Key, Value>> final : std::true_type {};
00051 
00052         static_assert(all_of<type_checker>(m_types));
00053     };
00054 
00055 }
